what: Bootstrap Statistic for a Super Sample — one_bootstrap
title: Bootstrap Statistic for a Super Sample — one_bootstrap
text: subsample given super sample, draws normal subsample size using provided parameters, collects new super sample, computes specified statistic resulting super sample.

title: Bootstrap Statistic for a Super Sample — one_bootstrap
Bootstrap Statistic for a Super Sample — one_bootstrap
text: x object class CSuperSample, representing original super sample. hat_sigma mean parameter normal distribution used resampling. hat_gamma covariance parameter normal distribution used resampling. geom geometry parameter passed riemtan::rspdnorm. stat_fun function compute statistic resulting CSuperSample object.

title: Bootstrap Statistic for a Super Sample — one_bootstrap
text: value returned stat_fun applied bootstrapped super sample.

title: Bootstrap Statistic for a Super Sample — one_bootstrap
text: function performs parametric bootstrap resampling subsample x according specified parameters, aggregates resampled data new CSuperSample computes desired statistic.

title: Compute Pillai's Trace Statistic — pillais_trace
text: Calculates Pillai's trace statistic given super_sample object. function ensures within-group total covariance matrices computed, computes sum eigenvalues matrix (Total - Within) %*% solve(Total).

title: Compute p-values using bootstrap — riem_anova
text: Computes bootstrap-based p-value given super sample. statistic used bootstrap can specified via stat_fun argument.

Compute p-values using bootstrap — riem_anova
text: ss object class CSuperSample. stat_fun function compute statistic CSuperSample object (default: log_wilks_lambda). den number bootstrap samples generate estimating p-value.

title: Compute p-values using bootstrap — riem_anova
text: numeric bootstrap p-value.

title: Compute p-values using bootstrap — riem_anova

what: Harmonize Tangent Images Across Batches Using Rigid Correction — rigid_harmonization
title: Harmonize Tangent Images Across Batches Using Rigid Correction — rigid_harmonization
text: Applies rigid harmonization procedure tangent images CSuperSample object. First, batch means subtracted sample's tangent images (batch correction), overall mean added back (global correction). harmonized tangent images used reconstruct new CSample objects, collected new CSuperSample.

title: Harmonize Tangent Images Across Batches Using Rigid Correction — rigid_harmonization
Harmonize Tangent Images Across Batches Using Rigid Correction — rigid_harmonization
text: super_sample CSuperSample object containing samples harmonize.

title: Harmonize Tangent Images Across Batches Using Rigid Correction — rigid_harmonization
text: new CSuperSample object harmonized tangent images.

title: Harmonize Tangent Images Across Batches Using Rigid Correction — rigid_harmonization
text: function performs harmonization two steps: Batch Correction: batch, mean tangent images subtracted tangent image batch. Global Correction: overall mean (across batches) tangent images added back tangent image. harmonized tangent images used reconstruct samples using reference point metric original CSuperSample.
